notes: This site is located south of Fort Collins at the Larimer County Landfill on Taft Hill Road.  From Loveland go north on Wilson Avenue which turns into Taft Hill Road. The program is free of charge to Larimer County residents.  There is a Drop N' Swap at this site, please call for details.  The drop-off for business waste is on Wednesday's by appointment only.
